text: Pagans diysno ye tsey khto kazhutʹ shcho BOH yavlyaye soboyu Messiah, syn Mary. Messiah sebe skazaly, "O Dity Izrayilya, vy budete obozhnyuvaty BOHA; miy Lord ta vash Lord." Budʹ khto khto vstanovlyuye budʹ-yakoho idola bilya BOHA, BOH zaboronyv Ray dlya nʹoho, ta yoho dolya Peklo. Bezputnyy ne mayutʹ helpers
